(11.63)
We now explicitly condition on the parametersθof the probabilistic model,
which we previously omitted. In (11.63), we sum over allKpossible one-
hot encodings of z, which is denoted by ∑
z. Since there is only a single
nonzero single entry in each zthere are only K possible conﬁgurations/
settings of z. For example, if K = 3, then zcan have the conﬁgurations
